mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KUKOKUK_DAILY_STUDY_CARDS (DAILY_STUDY_NO, CARD_INDEX, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (#{dailyStudyNo}, #{cardIndex}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT DAILY_STUDY_CARD_NO AS dailyStudyCardNo, TITLE, CONTENT, CARD_INDEX AS cardIndex, DAILY_STUDY_NO AS dailyStudyNo FROM KUKOKUK_DAILY_STUDY_CARDS WHERE DAILY_STUDY_NO = #{dailyStudyNo} ORDER BY CARD_INDEX
